description.en:
Bountie Hunter is a GameFi ecosystem that helps gamers to make money from gaming. Our mission is to be the de-facto platform for gamers to discover and invest in crypto gaming and metaverse projects.  

Token holders of ‘BOUNTIE’, will be able to earn rewards by playing play-to-earn(P2E) blockchain games, staking, farming, airdrops and also esports tournaments.
